scenes.description: High-speed montage of various hololive VTubers' 3D lives and events from 2023, accompanied by a danceable track.
Introduction of the unit and the song 'Kawaikute Gomen'.
Performance of 'Kawaikute Gomen' by Minato Aqua, Usada Pekora, Momosuzu Nene, and Gawr Gura.

subtitles.original:
可愛くてごめん
作詞・作曲:shito 編曲:HoneyWorks
subtitles.english:
Kawaikute Gomen (Sorry for Being Cute)
Lyrics/Composition: shito Arrangement: HoneyWorks

subtitles.original: 私が私のこと愛して
subtitles.english: What's wrong with me loving myself?

subtitles.original: 何が悪いの？ 嫉妬でしょうか？
subtitles.english: Is something wrong with that? Is it jealousy?

subtitles.original: 痛いだとか変わってるとか
subtitles.english: That I'm cringy or that I'm weird...

subtitles.original: 届きませんね そのリプライ
subtitles.english: Those replies don't reach me at all.

subtitles.original: 大好きな お洋服
subtitles.english: In my favorite clothes,

subtitles.original: 大好きな お化粧で
subtitles.english: With my favorite makeup,

subtitles.original: お決まりのハーフツイン巻いて
subtitles.english: Curling my usual half-twintails,

subtitles.original: お出かけしよう
subtitles.english: I'm heading out.

subtitles.original: 日傘持って ぼっちだって
subtitles.english: With my parasol, even if I'm alone,

subtitles.original: 幸せだもん
subtitles.english: I'm still happy.

subtitles.original: チュ！ 可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute.

subtitles.original: 生まれてきちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for even being born.

subtitles.original: チュ！ あざとくてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being such a tease.

subtitles.original: 気になっちゃうよねごめん
subtitles.english: I know you can't help but notice me, sorry.

subtitles.original: チュ！ 可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute.

subtitles.original: 努力しちゃっててごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for putting in all the effort.

subtitles.original: チュ！ 尊くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so precious.

subtitles.original: 女子力高くてごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for having such high femininity.

subtitles.original: むかついちゃうよね ざまあ
subtitles.english: It's annoying, isn't it? Serves you right!

subtitles.original: あなたはあなたのことどうぞ
subtitles.english: You just go ahead and do you,

subtitles.original: 私に干渉しないでください
subtitles.english: But please don't interfere with me.

subtitles.original: 類は友を呼ぶと言うけど
subtitles.english: They say birds of a feather flock together,

subtitles.original: 届きませんね その陰口
subtitles.english: But that backbiting doesn't reach me.
